TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenVersion extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the specifications, such as the WS-*specifications, that security tokens are defined in.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the SecurityTokenVersion class to determine which version of the WS-* specifications that security tokens confirm to in a SOAP message.
Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager.CreateSecurityTokenSerializer%28System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion%29> method to create a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> that is capable of serializing and deserializing security tokens according to the set of specifications that are associated with a class deriving from the SecurityTokenVersion class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<string> GetSecuritySpecifications() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of supported security specifications.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains the set of supported security specifications.
